name: Michael Lajlev
title: Digital product designer
desc: I'm an ambition jack of all trades with a broad insight into the field of web design and development. I enjoy to work on products from ideation to actually build the product in collaboration with other team members.

timeline.title: Senior digital product designer
timeline.desc: I joined MobileThink to dedicate myself to designing innovative and engaging user interfaces to mobile consumers and mobile marketeers all over the world.

timeline.title: Digital product director
timeline.desc: I designed and coded various digital products targeted to young people. I worked as design lead for the inhouse development team, and collaborated with major danish municipalities and external design agencies.

recomendations.name: Anni Marquard
recomendations.title: Founder
recomendations.desc: Michael is a very flexible co-operative and professionally skilled employee - and it has been of great value for all of us soft humanists at CfDP to have an IT tech geek like Michael on the team.

recomendations.name: Jonas Sindal
recomendations.title: Concept developer
recomendations.desc: Michael is creative, fast and intuitive in his workflow and at the same time he is able to maintain a solid focus on the quality and durability of his products. He has a great eye for simplicity and for boiling down complex situations to minimalist design solutions.

timeline.title: Digital product designer
timeline.desc: I joined Trustpilot in it's early startup days. I had various roles within concept development, digital product design and frontend development. My focus troughout my time at Trustpilot was to improve user experience, and increase engagement for consumers and companies.

recomendations.name: Peter Holten Muhlmann
recomendations.title: Founder
recomendations.desc: Michael is just a pleasure to work with and is excellent when you ping-pong on new ideas. You always walk away smarter. I never met anyone with such an amazing curiosity towards new developments within technology.

recomendations.name: Victor Erixon
recomendations.title: Product designer
recomendations.desc: Michael was an excellent Prototype Designer, he worked really well in our team and he's very friendly. He could prototype features really quick, so quick that he had time to do some extra prototypes just to try out different scenarios. He's excellent.
